short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand Image Formats in Google Docs/Sheets/Slides. Support Format:'.webp','.bmp','.svg','.avif'. Previous name: Allow WebP

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to insert unsupported image formats like WebP, BMP, SVG, and AVIF into Google Docs, Spreadsheets and Presentation. Simply drag and drop the image file you want to insert into Google Docs and Slides. In Google Spreadsheets, you can copy and paste images directly into the cell you want. 
This Chrome extension works locally in your browser, no data is collected or transmitted in any way.

Google Docs and Presentation
- Drag and drop the image file you want to insert into the document.

Google Spreadsheets
- Copy the image you want to insert, click the cell, and paste the image.

Supported Image Formats
- WebP(.webp)
- BMP(.bmp)
- SVG(.svg)
- AVIF(.avif)

Previous name: Allow WebP

Note: When inserting SVG images, please be aware that the vector data may be rasterized. This means that SVG images may lose their scalable and editable vector properties and be treated as static images instead. As a result, resizing the image could lead to pixelation or quality loss.
